requirements.summary: Replace the WhatsApp phone number from +91 98765 43210 to 9040117361 in the HomePage component, ensuring the wa.me URL format is maintained
acceptanceCriteria: The WhatsApp link uses phone number 9040117361
The wa.me URL format is preserved
The emergency support message template remains unchanged

file_operations.description: Update the WhatsApp phone number in the wa.me URL from +91 98765 43210 to 9040117361. Locate the WhatsApp link section (likely in a Card or Button component) and modify only the phone number portion of the URL while preserving the wa.me format and any pre-filled message parameters. Ensure the updated URL follows the pattern: https://wa.me/9040117361?text=<encoded-message>
